name: IndiFTPD
short_description: IndiFTPD is a standalone (single executable) command line FTP server with many adv features (including SSL).  It is written in C++ and supports Windows, Linux, Solaris, and FreeBSD.  IndiFTPD is designed around a core server which can be easily extended.
